name: Escape The Dungeon! (Facundo Ponce)
description:
ESCAPE THE DUNGEON!

Hi!

This is a puzzle game . You have 5 levels where you need place some boxes to pass the other (Or just go to menu and choose what lvl play). 

The player can move 4 directions and sometimes in diagonal (Hint for the four level ;))  and you move the boxes with you!

CREDITS

Textures

Tiles by Szadiart at GameDevMarket

Buttons & Player by drido at GameDevMarket 

Box by Raou at GameDevMarket

Music

by Phobos Anomaly , ilikePiano and youareperfect at GameDevMarket

Made it with RAYLIB by Raysan5 https://github.com/raysan5/raylib

Developed by Facundo Ponce  |     Mail  dev.facundo.ponce@gmail.com

Thanks for the time an i hope you enjoy the game!
